terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.introduction_text: Welcome to Flowery! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Flowery mobile application and services. By accessing or using our app, you agree to be bound by these terms. Please read them carefully before proceeding.
terms.definitions_text: In these Terms, "App" refers to Flowery, "You" refers to the user, and "We/Us/Our" refers to Flowery. Our app offers flower delivery services and products that you can purchase through the platform.
terms.account_text: To use our app, you may need to register an account with accurate information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account. Orders placed through the App are subject to availability, and payment must be made at the time of order. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel orders for various reasons including availability issues or suspicious activity.
terms.delivery_text: Delivery times are estimates and may vary based on location and circumstances. We strive to deliver flowers in optimal condition but cannot guarantee exact appearance due to seasonal variations. You are responsible for providing accurate delivery information.
terms.cancellation_text: Cancellation requests must be made within 2 hours of placing an order and before dispatch. Refunds will be processed according to our policy and may take 5-10 business days.
terms.app_usage_text: You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes. Your privacy is important to us, and our Privacy Policy explains how we collect and protect your information. By using the App, you consent to our data practices.
terms.legal_text: The App and its content are owned by Flowery and protected by intellectual property laws. We may modify these Terms at any time. Flowery shall not be liable for any indirect damages resulting from your use of the App. These Terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which Flowery operates.
terms.contact_text: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:
terms.address: Address: 123 Flower Street, Garden City, FL 12345
